twitter.description: Defining the Cost of Cyber Risk is the #1 Challenge Organizations Face. Explore how OneTier's Risk Engagement solution helps you mitigate and manage risks effectively.

benefits.subtitle: At OneTier, we offer data aggregation for your business environments, so you can see exactly what is happening, and where it is happening.

features.title: Cost of your Cyber Risk
features.description: OneTier scans your enterprise to define cyber risk, identifying high-risk areas and associated costs. Focus your budget where it impacts security the most.

features.title: Compliance Management
features.description: Looking to become compliant in the latest standards, SOC2, ISO27001, CMMC 2.0, FedRAMP, HiTrust? We have you covered with AI-driven compliance tools.

features.title: CMMC 2.0 Compliance
features.description: Whether it is a CMMC Level 1 self assessment, a Level 2 with independent audit, or a Level 3 with government audit, we have you covered.

features.title: FedRAMP & StateRAMP
features.description: Using our scanning and AI documentation tools, we can reduce FedRAMP certification time from years to months, saving both time and money.

visual-guide.subtitle: At OneTier, we offer data aggregation for your business environments, to you can see exactly what is happening, and where it is happening.

pages.label: KubeZT Secure Apps
pages.title: Secure Kubernetes
pages.subtitle: Harden Apps designed to integrate zero trust into your infrastructure

pageContent.title: KubeZT Secure Apps
pageContent.subtitle: Streamline deployment with Zero-Trust Directory Services, PKI, Secure DNS, and Stealth Networking on a secure Kubernetes platform.

metadata.title: KubeZT Secure Apps - OneTier
metadata.description: Streamline deployment with Zero-Trust Directory Services, PKI, Secure DNS, and Stealth Networking on a secure Kubernetes platform with OneTier.
metadata.keywords: Kubernetes security, zero trust, PKI, OneTier
metadata.author: OneTier Team

og.title: KubeZT Secure Apps - OneTier
og.description: Streamline deployment with Zero-Trust Directory Services, PKI, Secure DNS, and Stealth Networking on a secure Kubernetes platform with OneTier.

twitter.title: KubeZT Secure Apps - OneTier
twitter.description: Streamline deployment with Zero-Trust Directory Services, PKI, Secure DNS, and Stealth Networking on a secure Kubernetes platform with OneTier.

benefits.subtitle: Save time deploying a suite of Zero-Trust enabled Directory Services, Public Key Infrastructure, Secure Domain Name Service, Resource Scheduling and Stealth Networking integrated into a secure Kubernetes Virtual Container Platform.

features.title: Zero Trust Directory Services
features.description: Deploy your application with MFA zero-trust directory services to ensure that anyone accessing the application is verified to be who they say they are, creating a least-privileged access environment.

features.title: Secure Domain Name Services
features.description: Kube ZT contains its own Secure Domain Name Service for fast and reliable network routing over Stealth Networking without compromising the container.

features.title: Public Key Infrastructure
features.description: Create secure development environments that mimic your production environments, ensuring that code works seamlessly when deployed.

features.title: Secure Containers
features.description: Built from the ground up with SBOM, secure virtual workloads compatible with the existing Kubernetes ecosystem.

visual-guide.subtitle: See how KubeZT Secure Apps can transform your Kubernetes security.

pages.label: AnyCloud Orchestration
pages.title: Cloud Automation, done right
pages.subtitle: Simple Digital Transformation. Cost, Drag, Drop & Scale your Multi-Cloud Environment.

pageContent.title: AnyCloud Orchestration
pageContent.subtitle: Optimize cloud costs with a unified, policy-driven interface that streamlines deployment and management.

metadata.title: AnyCloud Orchestration - OneTier
metadata.description: Optimize cloud costs with a unified, policy-driven interface that streamlines deployment and management with OneTier's AnyCloud Orchestration.
metadata.keywords: cloud orchestration, multi-cloud, digital transformation, OneTier
metadata.author: OneTier Team

og.title: AnyCloud Orchestration - OneTier
og.description: Optimize cloud costs with a unified, policy-driven interface that streamlines deployment and management with OneTier's AnyCloud Orchestration.

twitter.title: AnyCloud Orchestration - OneTier
twitter.description: Optimize cloud costs with a unified, policy-driven interface that streamlines deployment and management with OneTier's AnyCloud Orchestration.

benefits.subtitle: Understand the cost of your Cloud Deployments before you commit to a Cloud. One interface can save time in creating Cloud environments with a policy-controlled Visio-like UI.

features.title: Rates Matter
features.description: Know your pre-negotiated costs of each Cloud deployment before you commit to a Cloud.

features.title: Policies Enforce Controls
features.description: Object Policies ensure that security controls are met enabling industry or government compliant Cloud deployments.

features.title: AI-Enabled Mitigation
features.description: Your Cloud environment is under attack. AI detects the attack and seamlessly moves your deployment to a new Cloud in 11 minutes. Saving time and money remediating a Cyber Attack.

features.title: Workload Validation
features.description: Create environments and workloads with drag and drop simplicity, then have AI validate the workload. Once validated, deploy the workload with a single click.

visual-guide.subtitle: See how AnyCloud Orchestration can transform your cloud management experience.

pages.label: Secure Access
pages.title: Stop Phishing & Block Lateral Movement
pages.subtitle: Detect and deny malicious activity. MFA Privilege Access & Geofence Service Accounts.

pageContent.title: Secure Access
pageContent.subtitle: Control what was previously unmanageable by blocking lateral movement and preventing malware from entering through user clicks.

metadata.title: Secure Access - OneTier
metadata.description: Detect and deny malicious activity with Secure Access. Implement MFA, block lateral movement, and protect your organization from cyber threats.
metadata.keywords: secure access, MFA, lateral movement, cybersecurity, OneTier
metadata.author: OneTier Team

og.title: Secure Access - OneTier
og.description: Detect and deny malicious activity with Secure Access. Implement MFA, block lateral movement, and protect your organization from cyber threats.

twitter.title: Secure Access - OneTier
twitter.description: Detect and deny malicious activity with Secure Access. Implement MFA, block lateral movement, and protect your organization from cyber threats.

benefits.subtitle: Control what you previously couldn't. Eliminate lateral movement in the network and prevent end users from unknowingly clicking links that allow malware into the network.

features.title: Verify Privileged User Access
features.description: Active Directory Admins have tremendous reach. Verify privileged access users before tasks are executed to prevent lateral movement with MFA.

features.title: Geofence Service Accounts
features.description: Keep zombie service accounts from taking over your network. Geofence Service Accounts to the server they need access to limiting data exfiltration and reducing risk.

features.title: Secure Website Access
features.description: Take away distractions. Access only the sites needed for individual roles.

features.title: Prevent Malicious Site Access
features.description: The quickest way to ransomware is by clicking malicious links. Stop them instantly by preventing links from connecting when clicked regardless of being on the network.

visual-guide.subtitle: Discover how Secure Access can fortify your organization against cyber threats.

pages.label: Stealth Networking
pages.title: Secure and Hide Your Network
pages.subtitle: Make your Firewall a True Firewall - Block Inbound Ports. A true service mesh network - realized.

pageContent.title: Stealth Networking
pageContent.subtitle: Protect your data with a service mesh that fortifies inbound firewall ports and enables edge services through scalable, multipath secure networking.

metadata.title: Stealth Networking - OneTier
metadata.description: Protect your network with Stealth Networking. Secure inbound firewall ports and enable edge services with scalable, multipath secure networking.
metadata.keywords: stealth networking, service mesh, secure networking, firewall, OneTier
metadata.author: OneTier Team

og.title: Stealth Networking - OneTier
og.description: Protect your network with Stealth Networking. Secure inbound firewall ports and enable edge services with scalable, multipath secure networking.

twitter.title: Stealth Networking - OneTier
twitter.description: Protect your network with Stealth Networking. Secure inbound firewall ports and enable edge services with scalable, multipath secure networking.

benefits.subtitle: Keep your data secure in transit over a secure service mesh that allows you to close inbound firewall ports and enable edge services over multipath scalable secure networking.

features.title: Secure Service Mesh
features.description: Only those with the secret route know the way to the destination. Everything else is left on the outside looking in.

features.title: Multipathing
features.description: Get the most bandwidth and keep threat actors guessing as paths and routes through the internet constantly change as data is pushed down multiple routes ensuring delivery.

features.title: Rotating Secure Routes
features.description: Static routes lead to hacks. Continuously rotating routes between endpoint and between routers protects data in transit.

features.title: SASE
features.description: Any endpoint can securely connect to any router, and any router can connect to any other router, using mutual Transport Layer Security to form an encrypted mesh SD-WAN.

visual-guide.subtitle: See how Stealth Networking can make your network invisible to threats.

og.title: Analytics HQ - OneTier
og.description: Visualize and interact with your data in real-time using Analytics HQ. Experience secure, unified data management and advanced analytics.

twitter.title: Analytics HQ - OneTier
twitter.description: Visualize and interact with your data in real-time using Analytics HQ. Experience secure, unified data management and advanced analytics.

benefits.subtitle: Combine high-speed data ingestion, modern data management, advanced analytics, and easy-to-create dashboards in one data execution engine.

features.title: Data Ingestion
features.description: Faster data acquisition from the edge to the core creates faster analysis and visualizations. Speed saves time, money, and lives.

features.title: Modern Data Management
features.description: Manage all your data sources and automate data pipelines with integrated data snapshotting to make the most of your data lakes.

features.title: Advanced Analytics
features.description: Find predictability in your data. Localized data and apps live in the same environment to streamline visualizations.

features.title: Open Source
features.description: Bring costs under control with a completely open-source highly flexible analytics platform.

visual-guide.subtitle: Explore how Analytics HQ can transform your data into valuable insights.

pages.label: Global Data Security
pages.title: Anywhere, Anytime
pages.subtitle: Create peace of mind that your data is always available, secure and ransomware resilient.

pageContent.title: Global Data Security
pageContent.subtitle: An encrypted global file system that consolidates storage, ensures immutability, and eliminates backups.

metadata.title: Global Data Security - OneTier
metadata.description: Ensure your data is secure and available anytime, anywhere with Global Data Security. Explore our encrypted global file system and resilient storage solutions.
metadata.keywords: data security, global file system, encrypted storage, ransomware resilience, OneTier
metadata.author: OneTier Team

og.title: Global Data Security - OneTier
og.description: Ensure your data is secure and available anytime, anywhere with Global Data Security. Explore our encrypted global file system and resilient storage solutions.

twitter.title: Global Data Security - OneTier
twitter.description: Ensure your data is secure and available anytime, anywhere with Global Data Security. Explore our encrypted global file system and resilient storage solutions.

benefits.subtitle: Discover all of your data and classify it into the correct categories so that it can be properly stored in an immutable global filesystem that is easily recoverable.

features.title: Global Immutable Filesystem
features.description: Bring your various Cloud object stores and file systems, and combine them into a powerful global file system to protect the original files, and back up all changes every 43 seconds.

features.title: AI-Driven Data Discovery and Classification
features.description: Find all the data in your Cloud and on-premise, and classify various types of data so that PII and PHI data is properly moved and protected.

features.title: NextGen Cloud Data Encryption
features.description: Secure Cloud data with encryption to protect it from AI and Quantum Computers. Encrypt data at rest and in transit.

features.title: Secure Encrypted Databases
features.description: View and read data in your encrypted databases while you decrypt and update a record at a time.

visual-guide.subtitle: Discover how Global Data Security can safeguard your data across the globe.

pages.label: Security Overwatch
pages.title: Know your Environment
pages.subtitle: Evolve with threats in real-time. Detect, Monitor & Remediate.

pageContent.title: Security Overwatch
pageContent.subtitle: Monitor your network and block threat actors with a comprehensive, user-friendly dashboard.

metadata.title: Security Overwatch - OneTier
metadata.description: Evolve with threats in real-time using Security Overwatch. Detect, monitor, and remediate threats with a user-friendly dashboard.
metadata.keywords: security monitoring, threat detection, network security, OneTier
metadata.author: OneTier Team

og.title: Security Overwatch - OneTier
og.description: Evolve with threats in real-time using Security Overwatch. Detect, monitor, and remediate threats with a user-friendly dashboard.

twitter.title: Security Overwatch - OneTier
twitter.description: Evolve with threats in real-time using Security Overwatch. Detect, monitor, and remediate threats with a user-friendly dashboard.

benefits.subtitle: All of the capabilities you need to monitor your network and prevent threat actors from exploiting and stealing critical data in a single user-friendly dashboard.

features.title: Malicious Email Detection
features.description: Continuously scan and detect questionable emails. Sort and quarantine malicious or scam emails so users don't accidentally click unknown links.

features.title: Endpoint Detection and Response
features.description: Monitor activity on end point devices to ensure that threat actors don't compromise devices to steal data or gain access to the network.

features.title: Complete Data Governance
features.description: Inspection, notification, and blocking of critical data leakage on networks and endpoints. Covering PHI, PII, PCI, NPI, passwords, certificates, source code, and other sensitive files.

features.title: Enterprise Security
features.description: Protect both the cloud instances and the device endpoints from a variety of malicious threats, attacks, and exploits. AI driven coverage of a broad selection of critical tasks.

visual-guide.subtitle: See how Security Overwatch can revolutionize your threat detection and response capabilities.

teamMembers.name: Chris Romeo
teamMembers.title: Chief Executive Officer
teamMembers.bio: Chris Romeo, a Co-Founder and the Chief Executive Officer of OneTier. He is an experienced Sales executive with over 20 years in Sales. He has previous Sales leadership roles at Atlantis Computing, Insight Engines, NICE, Kyriba and Dispersive.

teamMembers.name: Taber West
teamMembers.title: Chief Technology Officer
teamMembers.bio: Taber West, a Co-Founder and the Chief Technology Officer at OneTier. A US Navy veteran and master of four engineering disciplines, he has over 30 years of experience in technology working for McKesson, the US Department of Energy, CSC, DXC, & Accenture in leadership positions.

teamMembers.name: Jai Oliver
teamMembers.title: Vice President of Sales
teamMembers.bio: Jai Oliver is the Head of Sales at OneTier. He holds a Certified Professional Facilitator (CPF) credential from CustomerCentric Selling, MEDDPIC, SPIN, and Challenger methodology. He has over 20 years of experience in sales, business development, and Enablement at NICE, Centrical, and Replicant.

teamMembers.name: Krystal Morgan
teamMembers.title: US Partner Manager
teamMembers.bio: Krystal Morgan is a Partner Manager for North America at OneTier. She has managed partnerships and contracts in the public and private sector over the past 10 years with Fiserv. She is a veteran and continues serving as an Army Reservist.

teamMembers.name: Mateo Pinz√≥n
teamMembers.title: LATAM Partner Manager
teamMembers.bio: Mateo Pinzon is a Partner Manager for Latin America at OneTier. Originally from Colombia, Mateo has specialized on international business development. Now he has a network of partners and end-users he works with in Latin America.

initiatives.description: Environmental Activism is a key part of OneTier's secure global strategy.
By the end of 2024, OneTier pledges to plant 10,000 trees.
OneTier is committed to achieving zero waste in all its operations by 2030.

events.title: Maryland Association of Counties Summer Conference
events.subtitle: Connecting Maryland's local government leaders
events.moreInfo: MACo's Summer Conference brings together approximately 3,000 leaders from all levels of government and the private sector. With four days of educational sessions, along with 2 exhibit shows (over 350 vendors!), and numerous briefings, meetings, and opportunities to connect with counties, this conference is a can't-miss event for anyone involved in Maryland's local government interests.

share.title: Join us at the Maryland Association of Counties Summer Conference 2024
share.description: Connect with 3,000+ government leaders at the Roland Powell Convention Center in Ocean City, MD, August 14-17, 2024.

events.title: Oklahoma Indian Gaming Association Conference and Trade Show
events.subtitle: The biggest little show in Indian Gaming
events.imageAlt: OIGA Conference and Trade Show logo
events.moreInfo: The 2024 OIGA Conference and Trade Show will be held in Oklahoma City, OK August 12-14, and will draw nearly 3,000 vendors, visitors and guest speakers to Oklahoma City to celebrate and advance our industry. It is a lively, fun, informative, high-energy assembly of some of the biggest names in the gaming and hospitality industries.

share.title: Experience the Oklahoma Indian Gaming Association Conference and Trade Show 2024
share.description: Join 3,000+ gaming industry professionals in Oklahoma City, August 12-14, 2024.

events.title: TechNet Augusta
events.subtitle: Transform, Align, Accelerate for Pacing Challenges
events.moreInfo: TechNet Augusta 2024 gives participants the opportunity to examine and explore the intricacies of the cyber domain. With assistance from the U.S. Army Cyber Center of Excellence and industry experts, the conference is designed to open the lines of communication and facilitate networking, education and problem solving.

share.title: Join us at TechNet Augusta 2024
share.description: Explore cyber domain challenges with military and industry experts, August 19-22, 2024 in Augusta, GA.

events.title: DEF CON 32
events.subtitle: The world's largest hacker convention
events.moreInfo: DEF CON is a hacker convention which takes place immediately following Black Hat in Las Vegas every year. Tickets are available for purchase through Black Hat registration until August 2, 2024, or on-site at the Las Vegas Convention Center during DEF CON.

share.title: Attend DEF CON 32 in Las Vegas
share.description: Join the world's largest hacker community at DEF CON 32, August 8-11, 2024 in Las Vegas.
